name: P21
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated wide-angle camera mounted on garage, suburban home driveway and front yard at dusk. Fading natural light mixed with activated porch lights, long shadows. Two people in dark clothing. They split up at the driveway, one going to the front door, another around the side. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, Transitional lighting quality, warm tones, automatic exposure adjusting. Realistic human motion, 20-second duration.
